Author: joe2x4#5987
Content: Seems that our strategy is a defensive one. Many articles, blogs, tweets either fail to mention or incorrectly mention kmd. We defend with correct info. Maybe at some point the strategy should change to offense. Ie: a crypto challenge or a crypto throw down. Make the other projects go on the defensive. Or when a scaling test is done, make a big deal about it.  Advertise the coming achievement and deliver it to the masses with a little fanfare.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content:
Have we stopped trying to get Trezor integration? Ledger has obviously been nothing but problems, and I remember from a while back Stick was pretty receptive to the idea and he knows some Komodo Devs? Maybe we should set up a twitter blast to randomly target some of their tweets with Komodo integration comments, likes, retweets. Could potentially focus on the fact Ledger hasn't resolved core issues we need for too long and they'd likely make a lot more sales of KMD holders moving from ledger (like me) though this may appear adversarial, I think we've given Ledger enough time to correct this issue. 

@benohanlon @Steve Lee  What do you think? are we ready to help them integrate if they need assistance?

Content: specifically the integration of a claim now button, and viewing of nlocktime which I believe is the issue with Ledger.
